content: Hello! Welcome to our booking system. What is your full name?
Sorry, that doesn't look like a valid name. Can you please provide your full name using only letters?
Thanks, John Doe. Now, please provide your email address.
That doesn't appear to be a valid email address. Can you please re-enter it in the format user@example.com?
Got it, john.doe@gmail.com. Now, what date would you prefer?
The date you entered is in the past. Please provide a valid future date, for example, 'April 15th, 2025' or '2025-04-15'.
Okay, 2025-10-15. Let me confirm everything... To confirm, you are booking with the name John Doe, email john.doe@gmail.com, and the date 2025-10-15. Is that correct? (Yes/No)
Please let me know which part you would like to change.
Okay, updated to 2025-11-20. Let me confirm again... To confirm, you are booking with the name John Doe, email john.doe@gmail.com, and the date 2025-11-20. Is that correct? (Yes/No)
Great! Your booking has been confirmed.
